data.lyric:
[ti:Shut Up]
[ar:Greyson Chance]
[al:Shut Up]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Shut Up - Greyson Chance (格雷森.迈克尔.蔡斯)
[00:00.22]Lyrics by：Greyson Chance
[00:00.44]Composed by：Greyson Chance
[00:00.67]I cannot hold my tongue
[00:02.72]You give me much to say
[00:04.96]I'm sweating bullets
[00:06.51]Nervous that you'll push away
[00:09.57]And when your eyes catch mine
[00:11.60]I know I talk too much
[00:14.22]So give me your two lips
[00:16.30]And baby I'll shut up
[00:18.52]Lying on the beach
[00:20.17]The middle of December
[00:22.74]I'm thinking you're too cool to even remember
[00:27.02]My face my hair my eyes my lips and my name
[00:36.76]Lighting up that clove
[00:38.45]Your confidence is what I want
[00:41.65]I say a lot I'm loud
[00:43.89]'Cause maybe you're the one
[00:46.50]Your hair your eyes your lips and your name
[00:54.69]Baby
[00:55.30]I cannot hold my tongue
[00:57.63]You give me much to say
[00:59.86]I'm sweating bullets
[01:01.40]Nervous that you'll push away
[01:04.48]And when your eyes catch mine
[01:06.74]I know I talk too much
[01:08.98]So give me your two lips
[01:11.35]And baby I'll shut up
[01:16.15]Oh baby I'll shut up
[01:20.70]Oh baby I'll shut up
[01:25.28]Oh baby I'll shut up
[01:29.92]Oh baby I'll shut up
[01:31.22]You dress in all black
[01:33.24]The middle of the summer
[01:35.94]You're smoother than you think you rock that Alex Turner
[01:39.92]Your style your arms wrapped in leather makes me want you forever
[01:49.72]But I cannot break this habit pure anxiety
[01:54.99]Stuck here searching for some words that you might need
[01:59.57]Maybe you don't need them it's not what we're about
[02:03.95]And maybe I'll just slow it down
[02:06.72]Down
[02:07.35]Down
[02:07.81]Down
[02:08.19]Down
[02:08.43]Down
[02:08.69]I cannot hold my tongue
[02:10.87]You give me much to say
[02:13.03]I'm sweating bullets
[02:14.61]Nervous that you'll push away
[02:17.61]And when your eyes catch mine
[02:19.87]I know I talk too much
[02:22.15]So give me your two lips
[02:24.47]And baby I'll shut up
[02:29.21]Oh baby I'll shut up
[02:33.67]Oh baby I'll shut up
[02:38.28]Oh baby I'll shut up
[02:42.47]Oh baby I'll shut up
data.trans:
[ti:Shut Up]
[ar:Greyson Chance]
[al:Shut Up]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.22]//
[00:00.44]//
[00:00.67]我无法保持沉默
[00:02.72]心中有千言万语想对你说
[00:04.96]我汗如雨下
[00:06.51]担心你会将我推开
[00:09.57]你与我四目相对
[00:11.60]让我明白 是我话太多
[00:14.22]与我热吻吧
[00:16.30]宝贝 我会就此沉默
[00:18.52]躺在沙滩上
[00:20.17]那时正值十二月中旬
[00:22.74]我想毫不在乎的你根本就想不起来
[00:27.02]我的面貌 我的发型 我的嘴唇 我的名字
[00:36.76]燃起丁香味的蜡烛
[00:38.45]我欣赏你的自信
[00:41.65]我对着你喋喋不休
[00:43.89]因为你也许就是我的良人
[00:46.50]你的头发 你的眼神 你的双唇 你的名字 
[00:54.69]宝贝
[00:55.30]我无法保持沉默
[00:57.63]心中有千言万语想对你说
[00:59.86]我汗如雨下
[01:01.40]担心你会将我推开
[01:04.48]你与我四目相对
[01:06.74]让我明白 是我话太多
[01:08.98]与我热吻吧
[01:11.35]宝贝 我会就此沉默
[01:16.15]宝贝 我会就此沉默
[01:20.70]宝贝 我会就此沉默
[01:25.28]宝贝 我会就此沉默
[01:29.92]宝贝 我会就此沉默
[01:31.22]你一袭黑衣
[01:33.24]在这盛夏时节
[01:35.94]你静若处子 动若疯兔
[01:39.92]你穿着皮衣的样子 令我魂牵梦绕 
[01:49.72]为你焦虑 这已成为我生活中难以摒弃的习惯
[01:54.99]我呆若木鸡 只为想出一些讨你欢心的话语
[01:59.57]也许你并不想听 我们也不该这样
[02:03.95]也许我会和你慢慢发展
[02:06.72]慢慢发展
[02:07.35]慢慢发展
[02:07.81]慢慢发展
